title: Active Raid: Kidou Kyoushuushitsu Dai Hachigakari
alternative_title: Active Raid - Kidou Kyoushuushitsu Daihachigakari ; Active Raid: Kidou Kyoushuushitsu Dai-8-gakari ; Active Raid: Special Public Security Fifth Division Third Mobile Assault Eighth Unit ; Active Raid - Special Public Security Fifth Division Third Mobile Assault Eighth Unit
status: Active Raid - Kidou Kyoushuushitsu Daihachigakari ; Active Raid: Kidou Kyoushuushitsu Dai-8-gakari ; Active Raid: Special Public Security Fifth Division Third Mobile Assault Eighth Unit ; Active Raid - Special Public Security Fifth Division Third Mobile Assault Eighth Unit
description:
Description :
        Set in a part of Tokyo that has descended into a quagmire, the story follows Unit 8 of the 5th Special Public Security Section's 3rd Mobile Assault Division, popularly called "The Eighth," who don powered armor "Willwear" exoskeletons to counter the rise in crime.

Assistant inspector Asami Kazari is assigned to The Eighth with the task of assessing the unit's status and reporting it to her superiors. But her true goal is to rehabilitate this sloppy, haphazard, justice-less group.
